title: Ep 523 | Phil Scolds Jase for a Humor Mix-Up & Miss Kay Has a Crazy New Injury
description:
Jase attempts to share what he finds funny about church parking lot signs, and Phil turns to Scripture to rebuke his son! Jase talks about the hellfire and brimstone sermons he grew up listening to and questions whether it's really the right way to go. Miss Kay injures her hand while fighting a bee. Phil debates Jase over his weight and shows off his torn unicep. Al makes a great point about Old Testament forgiveness. And Zach details the ways that the human heart must be tended to and not ignored.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
